body_html:
@av8ramit ,

git pull origin master

bazel --output_base=/mnt/local0/ clean

./configure

bazel --output_base=/mnt/local0/ --output_user_root=/mnt/local0/zdong build --config=opt --config=cuda --copt=-march=native //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package -j 31

bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package ~/tensorflow_pkg

sudo -E pip install tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.3.0rc1-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl --upgrade

python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"
body_text:
@av8ramit ,
git pull origin master

bazel --output_base=/mnt/local0/ clean

./configure

bazel --output_base=/mnt/local0/ --output_user_root=/mnt/local0/zdong build --config=opt --config=cuda --copt=-march=native //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package -j 31

bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package ~/tensorflow_pkg

sudo -E pip install tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.3.0rc1-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl --upgrade

python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"
body:
@av8ramit ,
```
git pull origin master

bazel --output_base=/mnt/local0/ clean

./configure

bazel --output_base=/mnt/local0/ --output_user_root=/mnt/local0/zdong build --config=opt --config=cuda --copt=-march=native //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package -j 31

bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package ~/tensorflow_pkg

sudo -E pip install tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.3.0rc1-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl --upgrade

python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"
```
